alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northeast Aroostook; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook; Southeast Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 05 at 2:58PM EST until March 06 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 1 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches, mainly in the St. John Valley, sleet accumulations of between one and two tenths of an inch and ice accumulations of a few hundredths to one tenth of an inch expected. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Eastern, Far Northern and North Woods Maine. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 1 PM EST Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.
